item.title: Debating
item.description: Chapter 3 [Art et débat d’idées : l’art du débat] What are you going to learn in this chapter? The qualities needed to be good at debating and convincing people with language The usefulness and role of debating Some famous debating from American history Lesson 1 Document 1 : Jefferson and Hamilton Document 2 : Cabinet battle N° 2 Lesson 2 Study of a practice file for the exam 12 Angry men script Online debating critique Devolved parliament, Banksy Table produced in class to help with analysing a file

item.title: Minimal art
item.description: Chapter 2 [Art et débat d’idées : l’Art qui fait débat] What are you going to learn in this chapter? You will learn about a famous British painter (Turner) You will learn vocabulary to talk about art and painting You will learn about minimal art You will learn to express your opinion about art You will learn to express your reactions

item.title: Introduction to art
item.description: Lesson 1 Vocabulary Basic vocabulary to talk about paintings (see worksheet) Document 1 : Mr Turner trailer Document 2 : Turner paintings See Turner’s most famous paintings Lesson 2 Document 3 : Interview with Mike Leigh Photocopy given in class For more information about Turner

item.title: Stolen generations
item.description: Chapter 1 : Stolen Generations [Art et débat d’idées : Art et confrontation] What are you going to learn in this chapter? You will learn about the bad treatment of Aboriginees in Australian past You will learn how to describe an artwork (colours, sections, emphasis, lines and shapes) and interpret it You will learn how to use SAY/TELL in English Errors to avoid : S 3PS, S plural, Adjs = no ‘s’, capital for adjective about a country Vocabulary on Memrise about the topic (Aboriginees, Stolen Generation, saying sorry, describing a picture) Lesson 1 Document 1 : Aboriginees in Australia Document 2 : Taken away by Sally Morgan See the image
